Primary UI colors

These are the primary colors used for UI elements. The primary colors have semantic meanings associated with them.

Colors

@brand-primary
#004C97
@brand-success
#007A33
@brand-info
#009CDE
@brand-warning
#F3D54E
@brand-danger
#A6192E

Grays

@gray-darker
#222222
@gray-dark
#333333
@gray
#555555
@gray-light
#808080
@gray-lighter
#EEEEEE

 

Full brand palette

This is the full USPTO color palette. However, many of these are rarely used for UI elements.
